title: DJ MENTZIK - MIXAMIX_20080113
description:
A few words about MIXAMIX 20080113

Dear music and trip lovers. 
After my last mix I was feeling a luck of inspiration to make a new one.
But then that magik New Years Eve night under the music carpet of Oakenfold who came at Athens my batteries were recharged.
I spent some time after looking at what tracks were played during that night and found lots of new things. And finally I made it.
I am starting with my own remix of well known Frankie Valli&#039;s - Beggin (pilooski edit).
Bored of hearing it again and again at the radio I decided to give it a new 
progressive essaince by mixing it. What&#039;s more? Lot&#039;s of nice vocal songs very well known and soundtracks that never die!
I tried to use remixes that are not heard much on the radio and as always I have installed my personal touch by working 
on the interconnections of the tracks for hours and hours trying to add riffs and beats to differ of the originals.
My gf after listening a pre-beta of this mix said that she felt like hearing a one track composition. 
So I think I am delivering you my friends another magik musical journey.

	Keep travelling, sharing music and have fun!
	
23 tracks in playlist, average track length: 3:31
Playlist length: 1 hour 21 minutes 1 second 

Playlist files:

1. C.M. - Dream Universe (Tilts Eastern Storm Remix) (3:20)

13. Orbital - Doctor Who (2:36)

Have a nice time and lovely journeys! 
Dj Mentzik (http://www.musicalgalaxy.com)
